text:
▷ 黑白漫畫同人誌
▷ 尺寸B5/24頁
▷ 10月底出貨
※附註※
➤若需要簽名請在「訂單備註」註明告知
➤由於賣場為繪師本人出貨，出貨時間可能會較久，會盡量早點出貨，謝謝
➤買動漫帳號有未取貨前科者一律不開放取貨付款(僅能先付款、純取貨)
➤若短期內不克取貨但想先成立訂單確保名額，請在「訂單備註」註明可出貨的日期
➤確定結帳即代表該筆訂單已經利用購物車功能合併完所有商品，事後的合併訂單要求，出貨前會盡量協助在可能範圍內為各位合併，但並非義務
trans:
▷ Black-and-white manga doujinshi
▷ Size: B5 / 24 pages
▷ Shipping by the end of October
※Note※
➤ If you need a signature, please indicate it in the "Order Notes."
➤ As the store ships directly from the artist, shipping may take longer, but efforts will be made to ship as early as possible. Thank you.
➤ Accounts with a history of unclaimed orders are not eligible for cash-on-delivery (prepayment only, pick-up only).
➤ If you cannot pick up the order in the short term but want to reserve a spot, please specify the available shipping date in the "Order Notes."
➤ By completing checkout, it means the order has been finalized using the cart function to combine all items. Any additional requests for combining orders will be accommodated as much as possible before shipment but are not guaranteed.
